CURICULLUM VITAE 
Full name: Nguyen Ngoc Tuyen 
Date of Birth: 24th February 1989 
Address: 2416 CT12B, Kim Van Kim Lu, Dai Kim Ward, Hoang Mai District, Hanoi 
Mobile: +84 973874452 
E-mail: thinghost76@gmail.com  
Info:  ​ http://thinghost.info/ 
Profile Summary: 
I am a passionate and proficient in PHP programming especially in Magento Framework. I’m also a 
Magento Dveloper, a Team – Project Leader mentor team of skilled Magento developers with best 
development practices, develop excellent eCommerce projects. Also a Freelance Magento 
Ecommerce Development built magento extensions (free for all) to help increasing overall experiences 
of Ecommerce as well.

Junior PHP Developer
June 2010 - June 2013 
●
Development of new features and testing of functionality the main tracker and forum. 
●
Web application maintenance. 
●
Ensured development was signed off prior to unit testing. 
Projects (Some of the best): 
TopsThailand 
Use reactjs as a frontend application and connect it with node powered backend. API calls to magento was 
performed by the node on the server side. This meant no calls to magento were send from the 
browser, API for mobile(Android and iOS application) 
From the API point of view it is good but there are some problems that we've met during the development. 
Magento2 endpoints sometimes are very limited. By default endpoint handler does not allow to 
inject additional data to the response as they are not provide extension_attributes to each one. 
https://www.tops.co.th 
LANCÔME Malaysia Official 
Magento 2 with an intergration with a CPRV system which controlling all the redemption products, 
redemption orders, customer identify numbers and information. The checkout was deep down 
customized like Magento 1 old fashion way. 
https://www.lancome.com.my 
shu uemura singapore 
Magento 2 with no checkout and order functionning but intergrated with a system to controlling 
the redemption products, redemption orders, coupon codes and customer information on 
multiple sites of an eco system. 
https://www.shuuemura.com.sg 
Philips Thailand 
Also a Magento 2 intergrated, sharing resources with several system to controlling the stocks, 
inventory products, redemption, coupon codes and customer information, sales orders 
between platforms. 
https://www.philips.co.th 
City Winery(Freelance) 
A multiple Magento 2 sites(with 10 stores), founded by Michael Dorf, City Winery is a unique 
facility, combining a fully functioning winery with intimate concerts, food & wine classes, 
private events in a variety of configurations, and fine dining. A challenging turns a big problem, 
how to choose good way to approach with a numerous tickets and events data every day. 
https://citywinery.com 
And so many other projects which I cannot list them here even they’re companies or freelance project 
both Magento 2 and Magento 1. I also contributed and developed several individual projects on other 
program languages Python such as Mage2gen, some personal Magento extension public for free on 
my GitHub. Sometimes you could easily found me on Magento Stack Exchange Network or Magento 2 
main GitHub repository.
